definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning

sentences.english: School choice is not only a educational behavior but also a economic choice.
sentences.chinese: 择校就学不仅是一种教育现象而且是一种经济决择。

sentences.english: Learn the fastest and simplest way to remove the core.
sentences.chinese: 那就学一下快速简便的去核方法吧。

sentences.english: No refund or partial refund will be made for any term during which the student was in attendance.
sentences.chinese: 学生已经就学的学期不能办理退费或部分退费。

sentences.english: The afternoon class is about the politic class, which we have learned in our high school .
sentences.chinese: 下午的课是我们在高中就学过的政治课。

sentences.english: maybe educationally, than, than on the computer science side.
sentences.chinese: 在就学方面，相比于计算机而言。

sentences.english: An examination given at the middle of a school or college term.
sentences.chinese: 我现在南开中学初中三上级就学。

sentences.english: We learn quickly to stay away from the nasty stuff.
sentences.chinese: 很快我们就学乖了，离这烂东西远远的。

sentences.english: I learned salsa, merengue on the first week when I got to New York City.
sentences.chinese: 我来纽约的第一周就学了萨尔萨舞和梅伦格舞。

sentences.english: "You ought to take lessons right away then, " replied Lester genially .
sentences.chinese: “那末你应该马上就学起来，”雷斯脱和蔼地说。

sentences.english: I have not completed application procedures to or been expelled from an academic program in the R. O. C.
sentences.chinese: 本人在台湾未曾完成申请就学程序或遭退学。

sentences.english: I'd rather learn the stylish Kazak embroidery.
sentences.chinese: 我要学就学哈萨克族最有特色的刺绣。

sentences.english: I should have learned Chinese instead of English.
sentences.chinese: 我真后悔学英语，早知道就学中文了。

sentences.english: The more problems that you work the better off you’ll be.
sentences.chinese: 做的题越多你就学得越好。

sentences.english: If you spend all your time in front of a computer, you won't learn anything.
sentences.chinese: 如果把时间都花在电脑前面，就学不到东西。

sentences.english: Your children learn from what they see you do.
sentences.chinese: 孩子看到你做什么，他们就学什么。

definition: to switch from one major or faculty to another (at a university)
to enter a school or college/to go to school for the first time as a child
to go to school/to attend school
to attend (a school)/to drop out (of college etc)
to seek knowledge/to study/to attend college
proficiency in a particular field (idiom)/skill in a specialized area (idiom)
to change schools/to transfer to another college
to drop out of school/to leave off studying/to interrupt one's studies
